<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/93be1644db2848659b0610477968c83f53619da1|patch 8.2.1838: Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression>
patch 8.2.1838: Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression

Problem:    Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression.
Solution:   Skip comment lines at the script level. (closes #7111)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1838: Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression · vim/vim@93be164
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1838: Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression · vim/vim@93be164
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot insert a comment line in an expression. Solution: Skip comment lines at the script level. (closes #7111)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c07b7f701fb30d26112051e4ec737c7e3db72357|patch 8.2.1837: using "gn" after "gN" does not work>
patch 8.2.1837: using "gn" after "gN" does not work

Problem:    Using "gn" after "gN" does not work.
Solution:   Extend the other end of the Visual area. (closes #7109)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1837: using "gn" after "gN" does not work · vim/vim@c07b7f7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1837: using "gn" after "gN" does not work · vim/vim@c07b7f7
attachments.text: Problem: Using "gn" after "gN" does not work. Solution: Extend the other end of the Visual area. (closes #7109)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/62cd26a2294b7a5eead7c145e9bbc7c75f3bb801|patch 8.2.1836: autocmd test fails on pacifist systems>
patch 8.2.1836: autocmd test fails on pacifist systems

Problem:    Autocmd test fails on pacifist systems.
Solution:   Check that /bin/kill exists. (James McCoy, closes #7117)
            Tune the timing, make the autocmd test run faster.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1836: autocmd test fails on pacifist systems · vim/vim@62cd26a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1836: autocmd test fails on pacifist systems · vim/vim@62cd26a
attachments.text: Problem: Autocmd test fails on pacifist systems. Solution: Check that /bin/kill exists. (James McCoy, closes #7117) Tune the timing, make the autocmd test run faster.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6eb36ade9883f54c84c739c6a3504ddfa3343063|patch 8.2.1835: ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag>
patch 8.2.1835: ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag

Problem:    ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag.
Solution:   Do not translate "?" into ".".  (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #7114,
            closes #7115)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1835: ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag · vim/vim@6eb36ad
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1835: ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag · vim/vim@6eb36ad
attachments.text: Problem: ":help ??" finds the "!!" tag. Solution: Do not translate "?" into ".". (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #7114, closes #7115)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/efc0d94afc48a03b07955e91315e7e67945cd079|patch 8.2.1834: PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9>
patch 8.2.1834: PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9

Problem:    PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9.
Solution:   Do not call PyEval_InitThreads in Python 3.9 and later. (Ken
            Takata, closes #7113)  Avoid warnings for functions.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1834: PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9 · vim/vim@efc0d94
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1834: PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9 · vim/vim@efc0d94
attachments.text: Problem: PyEval_InitThreads() is deprecated in Python 3.9. Solution: Do not call PyEval_InitThreads in Python 3.9 and later. (Ken Takata, closes #7113) Avoid warnings for functions.
